findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.liquidateBorrowInternal(address,uint256,VTokenInterface) (VToken.sol#2232-2247):
	External calls:
	- error = vTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (VToken.sol#2239)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,vTokenCollateral) (VToken.sol#2246)
		- allowed = comptroller.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(vTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2260)
		- allowed = comptroller.seizeAllowed(address(this),seizerToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2353)
		- allowed = comptroller.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2158)
		- comptroller.seizeVerify(address(this),seizerToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2394)
		- comptroller.repayBorrowVerify(address(this),payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.borrowerIndex) (VToken.sol#2219)
		- seizeError = vTokenCollateral.seize(liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2313)
		- comptroller.liquidateBorrowVerify(address(this),address(vTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,actualRepayAmount,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2323)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,vTokenCollateral) (VToken.sol#2246)
		- totalBorrows = vars.totalBorrowsNew (VToken.sol#2213)
	VTokenStorage.totalBorrows (VToken.sol#198) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VToken.accrueInterest() (VToken.sol#1664-1742)
	- VToken.borrowRatePerBlock() (VToken.sol#1515-1517)
	- VToken.exchangeRateStoredInternal() (VToken.sol#1619-1649)
	- VToken.supplyRatePerBlock() (VToken.sol#1523-1525)
	- VTokenStorage.totalBorrows (VToken.sol#198)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.redeemFresh(address,uint256,uint256) (VToken.sol#1893-2013):
	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply = vars.totalSupplyNew (VToken.sol#2002)
	VTokenStorage.totalSupply (VToken.sol#208) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VToken.exchangeRateStoredInternal() (VToken.sol#1619-1649)
	- VTokenStorage.totalSupply (VToken.sol#208)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

	- transferAllowances[src][spender] = allowanceNew (VToken.sol#1398)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256) (VToken.sol#2156-2222):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2158)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- (failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REPAY_BORROW_ACCUMULATED_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)),0) (VToken.sol#2176)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.REPAY_BORROW_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (VToken.sol#2165)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- (failOpaque(Error.COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.REPAY_BORROW_COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed),0) (VToken.sol#2160)
	- RepayBorrow(payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.accountBorrowsNew,vars.totalBorrowsNew) (VToken.sol#2216)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,VTokenInterface) (VToken.sol#2258-2326):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(vTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2260)
	- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2292)
		- allowed = comptroller.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2158)
		- comptroller.repayBorrowVerify(address(this),payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.borrowerIndex) (VToken.sol#2219)
	- seizeError = seizeInternal(address(this),liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2311)
		- allowed = comptroller.seizeAllowed(address(this),seizerToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2353)
		- comptroller.seizeVerify(address(this),seizerToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2394)
	- seizeError = vTokenCollateral.seize(liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2313)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LiquidateBorrow(liquidator,borrower,actualRepayAmount,address(vTokenCollateral),seizeTokens) (VToken.sol#2320)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.mintFresh(address,uint256) (VToken.sol#1777-1841):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.mintAllowed(address(this),minter,mintAmount) (VToken.sol#1779)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.MINT_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (VToken.sol#1786)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- (failOpaque(Error.COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.MINT_COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed),0) (VToken.sol#1781)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- (failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.MINT_EXCHANGE_RATE_READ_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)),0) (VToken.sol#1793)
	- Mint(minter,vars.actualMintAmount,vars.mintTokens) (VToken.sol#1834)
	- Transfer(address(this),minter,vars.mintTokens) (VToken.sol#1835)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,VTokenInterface) (VToken.sol#2258-2326):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(vTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2260)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.INVALID_CLOSE_AMOUNT_REQUESTED,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_CLOSE_AMOUNT_IS_UINT_MAX),0) (VToken.sol#2287)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.INVALID_ACCOUNT_PAIR,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_LIQUIDATOR_IS_BORROWER),0) (VToken.sol#2277)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.INVALID_CLOSE_AMOUNT_REQUESTED,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_CLOSE_AMOUNT_IS_ZERO),0) (VToken.sol#2282)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- (failOpaque(Error.COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed),0) (VToken.sol#2262)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (VToken.sol#2267)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_COLLATERAL_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (VToken.sol#2272)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.redeemFresh(address,uint256,uint256) (VToken.sol#1893-2013):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (VToken.sol#1933)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_NEW_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (VToken.sol#1955)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- fail(Error.TOKEN_INSUFFICIENT_CASH,FailureInfo.REDEEM_TRANSFER_OUT_NOT_POSSIBLE) (VToken.sol#1960)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_FEE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (VToken.sol#1979)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_FEE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (VToken.sol#1989)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_FEE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (VToken.sol#1984)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- failOpaque(Error.COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.REDEEM_COMPTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed) (VToken.sol#1935)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.REDEEM_FRESHNESS_CHECK) (VToken.sol#1940)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_NEW_TOTAL_SUPPLY_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (VToken.sol#1950)
	- Redeem(redeemer,remainedAmount,vars.redeemTokens) (VToken.sol#2007)
	- RedeemFee(redeemer,feeAmount,vars.redeemTokens) (VToken.sol#1994)
	- Transfer(redeemer,address(this),vars.redeemTokens) (VToken.sol#2006)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,VTokenInterface) (VToken.sol#2258-2326):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(vTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2260)
	- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2292)
		- allowed = comptroller.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2158)
		- comptroller.repayBorrowVerify(address(this),payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.borrowerIndex) (VToken.sol#2219)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2292)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (VToken.sol#638)
		- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2292)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (VToken.sol#629)
		- (fail(TokenErrorReporter.Error(repayBorrowError),FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_REPAY_BORROW_FRESH_FAILED),0) (VToken.sol#2294)
	- RepayBorrow(payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.accountBorrowsNew,vars.totalBorrowsNew) (VToken.sol#2216)
		- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (VToken.sol#2292)
